turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a coffee from Starbucks for pickup

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to order it from the one on SR 39 next to I65?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes I would.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What drink would you like

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a Salted Caramel Mocha

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like whipped cream on that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What sort of milk would you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like the 2%

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want the Caramel Drizzle sauce?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that would be great

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any other flavor pumps?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, add a pump of Hazlenut flavor

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want the drink iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hot please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How soon would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: As soon as possible.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order for a Grande Salted Caramel Hot Mocha, with 2% milk, whipped topping, caramel topping, and an additional pump of hazlenut will be ready at the SR 39/I65 store shortly. You'll receive a text message confirming your order

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thanks.
